tuv.seg: <b0>NOTE:</b0> Due to the modular nature of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> there are certain things that are not included in this user manual, particularly those aspects of setting up and connecting the different devices that can be supported.

<b0>注意：</b0> 由于 the modular nature of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> there are certain things that are not included in this user manual, particularly those aspects of setting up and connecting the different devices that can be supported.
Coziness can help your game appeal to broader audiences.
舒适感可以让你的游戏有更广泛的受众。
Coziness helps retention by giving players control over pacing while still maintaining engagement during periods of rest.
舒适感可以让玩家掌控节奏，就算玩家在休息时也能参与到游戏中来。.
Coziness is a common aesthetic in popular games such as Animal Crossing or Stardew Valley, yet it rarely discussed within design circles.
舒适感是在游戏中一种常见的审美，就像《动物之森》和《星露谷物语》，但它很少在设计圈被讨论。
Coziness is a subversively humanizing design practice in a society built on monetizing base animal needs.
舒适感是一种颠覆性的人性化设计实践，它是建立在货币化生物基本需求的社会上的。
Coziness is an ingredient that can applied to a wide variety of both casual and core genres.
舒适感是可以使用于各种休闲或核心类型的元素。
Coziness itself refers to how strongly a game evokes the fantasy of safety, abundance, and softness.
舒适本身就是指游戏如何强烈地唤起对安全，富有和轻柔的想象。
Cozy Games
舒适的游戏
Definition of Coziness
舒适的定义
Familiarity, reliability, and one’s ability to be vulnerable and expressive without negative ramification all augment the feeling of safety.
亲切感，信任感，没有人需要假装自己很坚强，已经不表达负面的影响，这些都增加了安全感。
GameMaker Studio 2 Banner
GameMaker Studio 2 标志
GameMaker Studio 2 Manual
GameMaker Studio 2 手册
How do we make our games more cozy?
我们怎样才能让我们游戏更加舒适呢？
In a cozy game, nothing is high-risk, and there is no impending loss or threat.
在舒适游戏里，没有什么是高风险的，也没有即将发生的损失。
Our group consisted of:
我们的组员包括：
Our group of designers did a deep dive to understand:
我们这一组设计师深入探讨来理解：
Safety:<x1/> A cozy game has an absence of danger and risk.
平安：<x1/> 舒适游戏没有威胁或风险。

This document is divided into three parts with the aim of getting you introduced to the interface and basic workings of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> before going on to more advanced usage and the functions available through our propriety scripting language <a2>GML</a2> or our visual scripting tool <a3>Drag and Drop</a3>.

这个文档分成了三个部分，以便更好的给你介绍 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的界面和基础工作。 before going on to more advanced usage and the functions available through our propriety scripting language <a2>GML</a2> or our visual scripting tool <a3>Drag and Drop</a3>.
To maximize safety, activities should be voluntary and opt-in so that players never feel the threat of coercion.
为了最大限度地提高安全性，游戏活动应该是玩家自愿选择加入的，这样玩家就不会感受到强迫的威胁。
Welcome to the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> user manual!
欢迎使用 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>手册！
What a productive, happy group of people!
多么富有创造力，欢乐的一群人啊！
What is Cozy?
什么是舒适？
What is ‘Cozy’?
“舒适”是什么？
What we found during our exploration:
我们在探索中发现一些东西：
You can read the other reports here:
你可以在这儿看到其它的报道：
online documentation, web online help, web help, chm2web
在线文档，网络在线帮助，网络帮助b
